effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 685,716.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 206,503 damage and granting them 1,354 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 2.2 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
